      • getClassMetaID

        public static long getClassMetaID(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass eClass)

      • createCdoCreatedIndexOnTables

        public static void createCdoCreatedIndexOnTables(ICDORepository repository)
        Creates an index for the CDO_CREATED DB column for all tables mapped to the specified package.
        This method, first, tried to drop the existing CDO_CREATED index, if any.
        Parameters:
        nsUri - the unique namespace URI for the package containing all classifiers that are mapped to an ORM backend.
        otherNsUris - additional packages.

      • createCdoCreatedIndexOnTables

        public static void createCdoCreatedIndexOnTables(java.lang.String nsUri,
                                                 java.lang.String... otherNsUris)
        Creates an index for the CDO_CREATED DB column for all tables mapped to the specified package.
        This method, first, tried to drop the existing CDO_CREATED index, if any.
        Parameters:
        nsUri - the unique namespace URI for the package containing all classifiers that are mapped to an ORM backend.
        otherNsUris - additional packages.
